author: juanpablo
msg: * dependencies are downloaded from Central repo whenever is possible, in order to avoid
the mantainance of a libraries' svn directory.
* ${libs.opt} set to tests/libs-opt in order to avoid download opt files every time a
* added clean-deps target to remove all lib's directories. Useful to remove old jars
* get rid off maven-ant-tasks to download opt-libs: too many jars get downloaded, we're
having to ways of doing same thing and, as there are some libraries not present in
Central repo, seems better to download all files the same way. clean-deps target
needs to be run to ensure that maven-ant-task jar doesn't keep messing around.

author: juanpablo
msg: * ant clean target cleans all generated files
* junit reports are generated inside ${tests.report} instead of inside ${tests.src}

author: tv
msg: This test fell through the grid
